spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout (Dining top-left, Kitchen top-center, Living right, Bedroom bottom-left, Stairs bottom-right) generally matches the 2D plan. However, the central wet-area block deviates: the 2D shows a distinct Wash Area above the Toilet with its own enclosure and circulation, but the 3D reads as a simplified/merged space with different internal partitioning. Several door positions appear slightly shifted (notably Bedroom 1 entry and the wet-area entry), and window placement/count does not consistently match the plan (some openings appear omitted or relocated). Minor proportion differences are visible in the corridor/wet-area widths versus adjacent rooms.

structural_fidelity.notes: Primary adjacency relationships mostly hold (Bedroom–corridor, Living–entry, Kitchen–open hall, Stairs adjacent to Living), but the Wash Area/Toilet subdivision and access logic differs from the 2D plan, indicating altered internal walls/door embedding. Wall thickness is mostly consistent but varies at a few junctions. No clear extra (hallucinated) rooms, but at least one functional room (Wash Area) is not faithfully represented as a separate enclosed room as drawn.

furniture_mapping.notes: Dining table/chairs, bedroom bed, and living seating are present and roughly in the correct rooms. However, kitchen/utility fixtures do not closely follow the 2D layout (counter/appliance layout simplified), and bathroom/wash fixtures appear rearranged relative to the planned wash/toilet separation. Some furniture scaling looks slightly off (seating and circulation clearance in Living).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is clean and readable with consistent materials and acceptable lighting. Camera is more top-down orthographic-like than a true isometric; perspective/angle is mild and not strongly isometric. Geometry is mostly clean with no major artifacts, though opening details (windows/doors) lack precision relative to the plan, reducing clarity of architectural intent.

detected_errors.description: Wash Area not faithfully represented as a distinct enclosed room above the Toilet as shown in the 2D plan (appears merged/simplified in 3D).
Wet-area internal partitioning differs: the wall/partition between Wash Area and Toilet does not match the 2D layout.
Toilet/Wash access path differs from the 2D plan (door embedding/entry location appears changed).
Bedroom 1 door position appears shifted relative to the 2D plan placement along the corridor wall.
Window placement/count mismatches: at least one window/opening shown in the 2D plan appears missing or relocated in the 3D render (notably along exterior walls of main rooms).
Minor proportion distortion in the central corridor/wet-area block (widths and clearances do not preserve the 2D proportions precisely).
